snippet: Juicy escapism predominated on television this year, with series like “Scandal,” “Revenge” and “House of Cards” eclipsing offerings like ‘The Newsroom.’
abstract: Alessandra Stanley looks back at 2013 television offerings; says medium is still in golden age, but best shows looked brassy, with binge viewing, sexual intrigue and steamy feel dominating small screen.
lead_paragraph: Juicy escapism predominated on television this year, with series like “Scandal,” “Revenge” and “House of Cards” eclipsing offerings like ‘The Newsroom.’

headline.seo: Alessandra Stanley Sizes Up 2013 TV Fare
headline.main: I Want It Steamy, and I Want It Now
headline.print_headline: I Want It Steamy, and I Want It Now
